0.text: Innate: Talon's abilities apply a Wound stack to enemy  champions and large  monsters hit for 6 seconds, stacking up to 3 times. Basic attacks and damaging abilities refresh the duration.

1.text: Talon's next  basic attack against a target with 3 Wound stacks will consume the stacks to cause them to bleed, dealing them「 75 − 245 (based on level) (+ 200% bonus AD) total physical damage over 2 seconds, 」「 4.6875 − 15.3125 (based on level) (+ 12.5% bonus AD) physical damage every 0.125 seconds over 2 seconds, 」increased to 120% damage against  monsters. The target cannot gain stacks during this time.

0.text: Active: Talon  dashes towards the target enemy, dealing them physical damage upon arrival. If Noxian Diplomacy is cast within close range, Talon instead stabs the target,  critically striking them for (50% +  35%) bonus physical damage, as well as gaining  75 bonus attack range on his next basic attack within 1 second.

1.text: If Noxian Diplomacy kills its target, Talon  heals for 10 − 70 (based on level) and 50% of the ability's  cooldown is refunded.

2.text: Noxian Diplomacy's stab  resets Talon's basic attack timer.

3.text: Talon will attempt to basic attack the target afterwards.

0.text: Active: Talon sends out a volley of daggers in a cone in the target direction, dealing physical damage to all enemies within their path.

1.text: Upon traveling maximum range, the daggers then linger for 0.75 seconds before flying back to Talon, dealing physical damage to all enemies along the way and  slowing them for 1 second.

2.text: The traveling and returning pass each cannot affect the same enemy more than once.

0.text: Active: Talon  dashes over the target structure or piece of terrain, traveling up to 800 units, during which he gains  unobstructed vision.

1.text: Talon cannot cast Assassin's Path on the same structure or area of terrain for a set duration.

0.text: Active: Talon disperses a ring of blades around him, dealing physical damage to nearby enemies and gaining  invisibility and  bonus movement speed for up to 2.5 seconds.

1.text: Shadow Assault can be recast after 1 second within the duration, and does so automatically after the duration or if Talon emerges from invisibility.

2.text: Recast: Talon ends Shadow Assault, breaking invisibility and converging the blades to his location, dealing the same physical damage to enemies they pass through. Breaking invisibility with a basic attack or  Noxian Diplomacy causes the blades to converge to the target instead.

skillTabs.concerningText: Active: Talon  dashes towards the target enemy, dealing them physical damage upon arrival. If Noxian Diplomacy is cast within close range, Talon instead stabs the target,  critically striking them for (50% +  35%) bonus physical damage, as well as gaining  75 bonus attack range on his next basic attack within 1 second.

Upon traveling maximum range, the daggers then linger for 0.75 seconds before flying back to Talon, dealing physical damage to all enemies along the way and  slowing them for 1 second.

Unique – Carve: Dealing physical damage to an enemy champion applies a stack of Carve for 6 seconds, stacking up to 6 times. Each stack reduces the target's armor by 5%, up to 30% at 6 stacks.
Unique – Rage: Dealing physical damage to an enemy champion grants 3 bonus movement speed per stack of Carve on them for 2 seconds, up to 18.

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Bloodlust: After dealing damage to or taking damage from an enemy champion, heal for ( 2% / 1.2%) of maximum health over 6 seconds. This stacks and refreshes per unique champion, up to 5 times, but every stack beyond the first is reduced by 50%, for a maximum of healing for ( 6% / 3.6%) of maximum health over the duration.
Unique – Lifeline: If you would take damage that would reduce you below 30% of your maximum health, you first gain a shield that absorbs 100 damage for 4 seconds, increased by ( 8% / 4.8%) maximum health per stack of Bloodlust, up to an increase of ( 40% / 24%) maximum health at 5 Bloodlust stacks (60 second cooldown).
passive.originText: UNIQUE – BLOODLUST: After dealing damage to or taking damage from an enemy champion,  heal for ( 2% /  1.2%) of maximum health over 6 seconds. This stacks and refreshes per unique champion, up to 5 times, but every stack beyond the first is reduced by 50%, for a maximum of healing for ( 6% /  3.6%) of maximum health over the duration.
